ProgressItems.Name: 시작
ProgressItems.Description: 시작

ProgressItems.Name: Destiny
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Destiny' appears from now on.

Destiny - When attacking, there is a 50% chance for damage to be doubled and a 50% chance for it to be halved.

ProgressItems.Name: Faith Recovery
ProgressItems.Description:
A new feature, Faith Recovery, is unlocked when baptizing.

You can now restore the faith of desired units.

ProgressItems.Name: Starting dark essence I
ProgressItems.Description: The starting dark essence increases from 4 to 7.

ProgressItems.Name: Revenge
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Revenge' appears from now on.

Revenge - Counterattacks enemies within attack range.

ProgressItems.Name: Apostle Creation
ProgressItems.Description:
A new feature, Apostle Creation, is unlocked in the Sacrifice Stage.

You can now randomly create apostles via dark essence.

ProgressItems.Name: Starting dark essence II
ProgressItems.Description: The starting dark essence increases from 7 to 10.

ProgressItems.Name: Killing Spree
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Killing Spree' appears from now on.

Killing Spree - Gains an extra turn upon defeating an enemy.

ProgressItems.Name: Elite Clear Reward
ProgressItems.Description: Every unit restores faith by 1 as a reward for clearing an Elite enemy.

ProgressItems.Name: Maximum upgrade
ProgressItems.Description: The maximum upgrade increases from 2 to 3.

ProgressItems.Name: Thirst
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Thirst' appears from now on.

Thirst - Upon defeating an enemy, health permanently increases by 5, and attack by 2. (Resets in the Divine Hall)

ProgressItems.Name: Stigmata transfer
ProgressItems.Description:
A new feature, Stigmata Transfer, is unlocked in the Stigmata stage.

You can now sacrifice one unit to bestow one of its stigmata onto another unit.

ProgressItems.Name: Starting mana I
ProgressItems.Description: The starting mana increases from 50 to 55.

ProgressItems.Name: Teleport
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Teleport' appears from now on.

Teleport - Earns 1 Sacred Step upon defeating an enemy.
Sacred Step - Becomes able to move to any desired position.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlocking the Divine Hall I
ProgressItems.Description: You can now organize units from the Divine Hall in the slots of the Gravekeeper and Prisoner at the start.

ProgressItems.Name: Starting mana II
ProgressItems.Description: The starting mana increases from 55 to 60.

ProgressItems.Name: Forbidden Pact
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Forbidden Pact' appears from now on.

Forbidden Pact - The unit becomes stunned once, but the mana cost of the next skill is eliminated upon summoning.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlocking the Divine Hall II
ProgressItems.Description: You can now organize apostles or elites into normal unit slots in the start.

ProgressItems.Name: Sin
ProgressItems.Description:
Stigmata 'Sin' appears in the Sacrifice from now on.

Sin - Decreases the enemy's faith by 1 upon attacking.

ProgressItems.Name: 화신1 시작
ProgressItems.Description: 화신 설명

ProgressItems.Name: 선지자 I
ProgressItems.Description: 화신 (선지자)를 해금합니다.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Dark Prophet II
ProgressItems.Description: Skill 'Swiftness' now requires 0 dark essence.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Dark Prophet III
ProgressItems.Description: The mana cost of Whisper decreases by 5.

ProgressItems.Name: 화신2 시작
ProgressItems.Description: 강화 설명

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Saintess of Sins I
ProgressItems.Description: The incarnation "Saintess of Sins" is unlocked.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Saintess of Sins II
ProgressItems.Description: The amount of healing of the skill "Recovery" is increased by 5.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Saintess of Sins III
ProgressItems.Description: The Dark Essence cost of "Returning" decreases by 1.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Saintess of Sins IV
ProgressItems.Description: Skill "Prayer" no longer grants an attack power increase to enemies.

ProgressItems.Name: 화신3 시작
ProgressItems.Description: 강화 설명

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Heir of Vice I
ProgressItems.Description: The incarnation "Heir of Vice" is unlocked.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Heir of Vice II
ProgressItems.Description: Skill "Trade of Souls" now grants malevolence 2 times additionally.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Heir of Vice III
ProgressItems.Description: The mana cost of 'Divine Punishment' decreases by 10.

ProgressItems.Name: Unlock the Heir of Vice IV
ProgressItems.Description: The duration of Advent is increased by 1 turn.
